item.title: Ireland’s Review & Rate Solutions Company to Pay €35,000 to Web Partners
item.description: We have just launched a new partner program paying out substantial commission and bonus payments to web professionals, developers and marketers that refer customers. LouderVoice is Ireland’s largest and longest standing provider of Review & Rate (R&R) solutions to e-businesses. These solutions give customers the ability to post reviews of a products or services on the website they bought from. R&R tools are seen by market analysts as one of the most important tools for any website serious about online business*.
